There is no psp emulator, there's no region protection on the psp, so, yes, this works for UK players. Just get a custom firmware, or ISO loader and play.

There is no psp emulator, there's no region protection on the psp, so, yes, this works for UK players, and there's no difference between the EUR and US releases. Just get a custom firmware, or ISO loader and play.
